Type.Name: NetworkCredential

TypeSignature.Value: .class public NetworkCredential extends System.Object implements System.Net.ICredentials
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetworkCredential extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentials, class System.Net.ICredentialsByHost

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

remarks.para: The class supplies client credentials used in password-based authentication schemes such as Kerberos.

block.para: Classes that implement the interface, such as the class, return instances.
This class does not support public key-based authentication methods such as SSL client authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: .property string Domain { public hidebysig specialname instance string get_Domain() public hidebysig specialname instance void set_Domain(string value) }
public string Domain { get; set; }
.property instance string Domain

summary.para: Gets or sets the domain or machine name that verifies the current credentials.

value.para: A containing the name of the domain that verifies the current credentials.

remarks.para: The property indicates the domain or realm to which the account belongs. Typically, this is the host machine name where the application executes or the user domain for the currently logged in user.

Docs.permission: Requires read access to the environment variable that contains the domain name. See .
